energy.usef.dso.event.endpoint

Class EventEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.dso.event.endpoint.EventEndpoint

  • @Path(value="/Event")
public class EventEndpoint
extends Object
    Restful service to send events to the DSO.

    • Method Detail

      • turnOnOrOffScheduler

        @GET
 @Path(value="/Scheduler/{onOrOff}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response turnOnOrOffScheduler(@PathParam(value="onOrOff")
                                                                                                  String onOrOff)
        Turn on or off the scheduler. The values true/false, 0/1 or on/off can be used.
        Parameters:
        onOrOff - which is a string and can be true/false, 0/1 or on/off. When the value is unknown, the scheduler is turned on.
        Returns:
        Response.

      • sendCreateFlexRequestEvent

        @GET
 @Path(value="/CreateFlexRequestEvent/{entityAddress}/{ptuDate}/{ptuIndexes}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendCreateFlexRequestEvent(@PathParam(value="entityAddress")
                                                                                                                                                  String entityAddress,
                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="ptuDate")
                                                                                                                                                  String ptuDateValue,
                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="ptuIndexes")
                                                                                                                                                  String ptuIndexesValue)
        A CreateFlexRequestEvent event is triggered.
        Parameters:
        entityAddress - the entity address of the congestion point
        ptuDateValue - the period when the flex requests are analyzed. This is a date of the format YYYY-MM-DD.
        ptuIndexesValue - a comma seperated list of index of the ptu's.
        Returns:
        Response.
